++ Entity Store

Entity Stores are [Stores] for [Entity]s.

    * Entity Stores are rendered with the ObjectInterfacer.
    * They can have a specialised [UserInterfaces].
    * [EntityStore]s can usually be [Managed].
    * StandardMultiples and StandardEstablishment

see [Entity]

++Special Features
Unlike ComponentStore:
     * Downloaded without storing

++Exemplar Entity Stores
+++Accounts
[Accounts] are an EntityStore.
    * The local machine is an entity and contains references the account entities that are local.

+++Corporate
    * departments of an organisation, see [Business]

+++Data/Software
     * frequently modified data/software
     * whether it needs to be updated
     * backed up
